Package it.poliba.sisinflab.dlpreferences

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constraint
    An ontological constraint, represented as a propositional implication of the form A AND B AND ...
    DimacsProvider
    A function that converts propositional variable names (represented as Strings) into integer DIMACS literals.
    ModelConverter
    A set of methods that enable conversion between equivalent representations of propositional variables.
    VarNameProvider
    A function that converts integer DIMACS literals into Strings representing propositional variable names.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstraintSet<T extends Constraint>
    A set of ontological constraints.
    CPNet
    A CP-net.
    FeasibilityConstraint
    An element of the ontological closure.
    FeasibilityConstraint.Builder  
    OntologicalCPNet
    An ontological CP-net.
    OntologicalCPNet.Builder
    Creates OntologicalCPNet instances.
    OptimalityConstraint
    An element of the optimum set.
    OptimalityConstraint.Builder  
    PreferenceGraph
    A simple graph structure where nodes represent preference variables.
    PreferenceGraph.Builder  
    PreferenceGraph.Node
    The set of properties associated with a node of the preference graph.
